seo.title: Lukittu Dashboard
seo.description: Sign in to the Lukittu dashboard to manage and distribute your software licenses. Create products, assign licenses, monitor customer usage, and streamline license management all in one place.

validation.no_discord_account: You don't have a Discord account connected!
validation.password_min_length: Password must be at least 6 characters long!
validation.password_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter!
validation.password_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter!
validation.password_number: Password must contain at least one number!
validation.password_special: Password must contain at least one special character!
validation.full_name_min_length: Full name must be at least 3 characters long!
validation.full_name_max_length: Full name must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.terms_of_service_required: You must agree to the terms of service and privacy policy!
validation.team_name_min_length: Team name must be at least 3 characters long!
validation.team_name_max_length: Team name must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.team_name_invalid: Team name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and the following characters: - _
validation.invalid_turnstile_token: Failed to verify that you are a human. Please try again.
validation.team_has_users: Team has still users left and cannot be deleted!
validation.team_owner_cannot_leave: Team owner cannot leave the team!
validation.user_not_in_team: User is not in the team!
validation.product_name_min_length: Product name must be at least 3 characters long!
validation.product_name_max_length: Product name must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.product_name_invalid: Product name can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and the following characters: - _
validation.product_already_exists: Team already has a product with this name!
validation.license_key_invalid: License key must contain 5 groups of 5 characters separated by dashes!
validation.email_or_full_name_required: Email or full name is required!
validation.metadata_key_min_length: Metadata key must be at least 1 characters long!
validation.metadata_key_max_length: Metadata key must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.metadata_value_min_length: Metadata value must be at least 1 characters long!
validation.metadata_value_max_length: Metadata value must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.customer_exists: Customer already exists with given email!
validation.user_already_in_team: User with this email is already in the team!
validation.invitation_already_sent: You have recently sent an invitation to this user! Please wait at least 15 minutes before sending another one.
validation.invitation_not_found: Invitation not found! It may have expired. Please ask the team owner to resend the invitation.
validation.invitation_for_different_email: Invitation is for a different email address!
validation.file_too_large: File is too large! Maximum file size is {size}.
validation.invalid_file_type: Invalid file type! Only PNG, JPEG, and WEBP are allowed.
validation.device_timeout_positive: Device timeout must be at least 1 minute!
validation.too_many_requests: Too many requests! Please try again later.
validation.max_licenses_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of licenses allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more licenses.
validation.max_products_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of products allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more products.
validation.max_blacklist_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of blacklist values allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more values.
validation.max_customers_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of customers allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more customers.
validation.max_team_members_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of members allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more members.
validation.max_team_members_reached_invite: The team has reached the maximum number of members allowed for the current plan. Please ask the team owner to upgrade the plan.
validation.latest_release_not_allowed_with_licenses: Latest release cannot be set when release is restricted to specific licenses!
validation.blacklist_value_min_length: Blacklist value must be at least 3 characters long!
validation.blacklist_value_max_length: Blacklist value must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.blacklist_exists: This value is already in the blacklist!
validation.paid_subsciption_required: Paid subscription is required to use this feature!
validation.release_version_min_length: Version number must be at least 3 characters long!
validation.release_version_max_length: Version number must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.release_exists: Release with this version already exists!
validation.main_class_not_found: Uploaded file is JAR but extracting the main class failed! Please contact support.
validation.city_min_length: City must be at least 3 characters long!
validation.city_max_length: City must be at most 100 characters long!
validation.country_min_length: Country must be at least 2 characters long!
validation.country_max_length: Country must be at most 100 characters long!
validation.address_line1_min_length: Address line 1 must be at least 5 characters long!
validation.address_line1_max_length: Address line 1 must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.address_line2_max_length: Address line 2 must be at most 255 characters long!
validation.postal_code_min_length: Postal code must be at least 3 characters long!
validation.postal_code_max_length: Postal code must be at most 20 characters long!
validation.state_min_length: State must be at least 2 characters long!
validation.state_max_length: State must be at most 100 characters long!
validation.file_extension_not_found: File must have an supported extension!
validation.storage_limit_reached: Your team has reached the maximum storage limit allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to increase the storage limit.
validation.api_key_limit_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of API keys allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more API keys.
validation.max_invitations_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of invitations allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more invitations.
validation.max_releases_reached: Your team has reached the maximum number of releases allowed for the current plan. Please upgrade to add more releases.

general.wrong_provider: You have an account with a different provider! Please login with {provider}.
general.name: Name
general.locked_metadata_warning: This metadata field is locked. These fields are typically locked because they are system-generated. Modifying this field may cause issues with integrations that depend on this data.

oauth.unverified_email: You have an unverified email attached to your {provider} account. Please verify your email first.
oauth.server_error: Failed to authenticate with {provider}. Please try again later.

login.title: Sign in to your account
login.description: Enter your email and password to access your account.
login.email_not_verified: Your email is not verified. Please verify your email first.
login.seo_title: Lukittu Login - Sign in to the Lukittu dashboard

register.title: Create your Lukittu account
register.description: Enter your details to create your account.
register.email_already_in_use: This email is already in use!
register.email_sent_description: We have sent a email verification mail to {email}. Please check your inbox spam folder. If you don't receive the email within a few minutes, you can try registering again.
register.seo_title: Sign Up and Create a Lukittu Account | Lukittu

forgot_password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.description: Enter your email to reset your password.
forgot_password.email_sent_description: We have sent a password reset email to {email}. Please check your inbox spam folder. If you don't receive the email within a few minutes, you can try resetting your password again.

reset_password.title: Reset your password
reset_password.dont_want_to_reset: Don't want to reset your password?
reset_password.reset_success_description: Password reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.
reset_password.seo_title: Reset Password - Set a new password

verify_email.title: Your email is not verified
verify_email.description: You haven't verified your email yet. Please check your inbox for the verification email. If you can't find it, you can resend it here.
verify_email.verification_success: Your email is now verified. You can now go back to the login page and login.
verify_email.seo_title: Verify Email - Verify your email address

resend_verify.title: We have resent the verification email
resend_verify.description: We have resent a verification email to {email}. Please check your inbox and spam folder. If you don't receive the email within a few minutes, you can try registering again.

dashboard.no_recent_activity_description: No recent activity found. Recent activity will be shown here.
dashboard.recent_audit_logs_description: Showing recent actions performed in the system.
dashboard.no_recent_audit_logs_description: No recent audit logs found. Audit logs are created when an action is performed in the system.
dashboard.requests_description: Showing license verify requests divided by status.
dashboard.last_period_description: "Last period" refers to the same length of time immediately before the current one. For example, if viewing the last 24 hours, the previous period would be the 24 hours prior.
dashboard.product_division_description: Showing how licenses are divided between products.
dashboard.requests_by_country_description: Showing license verify requests in a map view.

analyzer.upgrade_to_use: Upgrade to the Pro plan to use the watermarking and analyzer features.
analyzer.description: Upload your files to analyze them for watermarks.

teams.create_team_info: You can change the team name after creation and add additional information.
teams.invitation_accepted: Invitation has been accepted! You are now a member of {teamName}.

profile.discord_description: Connect your Discord account to use Lukittu Discord bot.
profile.logged_out_all_sessions: You have been logged out of all other sessions.
profile.logged_out_session: You have been logged out of the session.
profile.team_leave_confirm_description: You are about to leave team {teamName}! You will lose access to this team and all its resources. This action cannot be undone.
profile.delete_team_confirm_description: You are about to delete team {teamName}! This will permanently delete the team and all its resources. This action cannot be undone.
profile.delete_team_not_empty_description: Team {teamName} must be empty from users before it can be deleted. Please remove all users from the team and try again when you are the last user left.
profile.transfer_ownership_description: You are about to transfer the ownership of team {teamName}. Please select a new owner from the list below. Keep in mind that you will lose all ownership rights and become a member of the team.

products.product_description: Products are what you sell to your customers. It can be any digital software you want to license.
products.delete_product_confirm_description: You are about to delete product {productName}! This will permanently delete all the data related to this product including all licenses. This action cannot be undone.
products.editing_products_of_license: You are editing products of license {license}.

licenses.remove_product_warning: Are you sure you want to remove this product from the license?
licenses.remove_customer_warning: Are you sure you want to remove this customer from the license?
licenses.emails_delivered: Emails delivered to all customers linked to this license.
licenses.email_delivery_confirm_description: You are about to send email delivery to all customers linked to this license. They will receive an email with the license key including information about the linked products.
licenses.license_description: Licenses are the keys that allow your customers to use your products. You can assign them to customers and track their usage.
licenses.delete_license_confirm_description: You are about to delete license {license}! This will permanently delete this license. This action cannot be undone.

logs.select_log: Select a log to view details
logs.no_logs_description: No logs found. Logs are created when a license verify request is made. You can view the details of the request and response here.

customers.customer_description: Customers are the people who buy your products. You can assign licenses to them and track their usage.
customers.delete_customer_confirm_description: You are about to delete customer {name}! This will permanently delete this customer. This action cannot be undone.
customers.editing_customers_of_license: You are editing customers of license {license}.

subscriptions.using_free_description: You are currently using the free plan. Upgrade to the paid plan for increased limits & get more features!
subscriptions.using_paid_plan: You are currently using the paid plan. Manage your subscription below.

audit_logs.no_audit_logs_description: No audit logs found. Audit logs are created when an action is performed in the system. You can view the details of the action here.

members.only_for_owners: This action is only available for team owner.
members.cancel_invitation_confirm_description: You are about to cancel the invitation for {email}! If you cancel the invitation, the user will not be able to join the team using the invitation link anymore.
members.kick_member_confirm_description: You are about to kick {email} from the team! If you kick the member, they will lose access to the team and all its resources.
members.member_invited: Member has been invited! They will receive an email shortly.
members.invite_member_description: Invite a new member to your team by entering their email address below. They will receive an email with an invitation link.
members.no_members_description: No members found. Members are the users who have access to the team and its resources.

integrations.need_integrations: Need integrations? We are working on integrations with popular services. If you have a specific service in mind, send us an email at support@lukittu.com!
integrations.stripe_integration_description: For automatic license generation and distribution, you can integrate Lukittu with Stripe. When a customer purchases a product, a license will be automatically generated and sent to the customer.

releases.license_restricted_tooltip: Release is restricted to specific licenses
releases.license_restrictions_applied: Release will be restricted to selected licenses only
releases.release_description: Releases are the versions of your software that you distribute to your customers. You can add, edit, and delete releases here.
releases.click_here_to_upload: Click here to browse and upload a file
releases.delete_release_confirm_description: You are about to delete release {version}! This will permanently delete this release and it's files. This action cannot be undone.
releases.set_as_latest_description: When checked, this release will be set as the latest release for the product and will be used if no specific release is requested.
releases.no_latest_release_description: You have not set a latest release for this product. It is used as a fallback if no specific release is requested.

settings.watermarking_description: Watermarking adds unique identifiers to your software to prevent unauthorized distribution. This feature is available only for Java-applications at the moment.
settings.rsa_public_key_description: This is your team's public key, which can be used to verify the authenticity of license verify challenges.
settings.reset_public_key_confirm_description: You are about to reset your team's public key! This will generate a new public key and invalidate the old one. You will need to update the public key in your software to continue verifying licenses.
settings.no_team_description: You are not part of any team. Create a team or join an existing team to start using Lukittu.
settings.limits_description: View and manage your team's limits. Upgrade your plan to increase the limits.
settings.need_increased_limits: Pro plan not enough and need increased limits? Send us an email at <emailElement>support@lukittu.com</emailElement>!
settings.api_key_description: API keys are used to authenticate your software with the Lukittu API. Keep in mind that API keys are sensitive information and should be kept secret.
settings.delete_api_key_confirm_description: You are about to delete API key with ID {id}! This will permanently delete this API key. This action cannot be undone.
settings.api_key_created_description: API key created successfully. Keep this key secret and do not share it with anyone. This is the only time you will see this key so save it now!.
settings.api_key_expiration_date_description: You don't need to set an expiration date but it can be useful for security reasons. If you set an expiration date, the API key will be automatically deleted after the date.

blacklist.blacklist_description: Blacklist values are used to block specific values from being used in license verify requests. You can add, edit, and delete blacklist values here.
blacklist.delete_blacklist_confirm_description: You are about to delete blacklist value {value}! This will permanently delete this blacklist value. This action cannot be undone.
